medical_history.chief_complaint: Overwhelming low mood along with poor sleep, poor energy, anhedonia, poor concentration, hypersomnia, and lack of motivation.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began chronically at least 3 years prior to the visit, with difficulty and pain in movement due to morbid obesity and gout complicating his condition. The patient lost his job and became homeless during this time.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Chronic severe major depressive disorder, type 2 diabetes, poorly controlled hypertension, recurrent nephrolithiasis, chronic sinusitis, morbid obesity, and gout. He had a prior involuntary hospitalization due to suicidal ideation.
medical_history.family_history: Family history is strongly positive for depression, including mother, maternal grandmother, maternal uncle, and sister.
medical_history.social_history: Homeless, and his adherence to prescribed treatments was uncertain.
